components.documentation:
On load, the 'before click' tab should be the only thing displayed. Once an 'On Click' action has been performed, then regardless if the ID is valid, the 'after click' tab should be displayed. Even though it's not technically a tab, this is what we will call it for now.

border-right: 1px solid black;
components.name: Page_Listener
components.value:
<script>

window.addEventListener('load', function() {
var i, tabcontent;		
tabcontent = document.getElementsByClassName("tabcontent");	

for (i = 1; i < tabcontent.length; i++)     		
tabcontent[i].style.display = "none";     
});
</script>

components.name: Instructions
components.value: Enter the Banner ID (991 number) for the person.

components.name: After_Click_Message
components.value:
The following information will be used to authenticate the user to the Help Desk. Please verify that it is accurate.


When you click the button below a new window will open, the user will be verified, and all information will be updated in the Parature system. You can continue to enter the ticket for the person by clicking the "Submit a Ticket" link, or you can now use Parature to pull the person's information up, and submit the ticket through the normal Parature interface.

components.name: dataLookup

components.documentation: Purpose of this component is to determine educational grade level of student. If a graduate student, the G_Current_Student Block will show. If an undergraduate student, the U_Current_Student_Block will show. This is done by reading the SARADAP_LEVL_CODE taken from the query SARADAP_LEVL Resource (attached to component and at the top of the Page). If none are displayed or value = NULL, then no blocks should display
components.name: Education_Level_Lookup

components.documentation: make text box dynamic; center text for grids/labels; clear cache with updated searches; make label text bigger; mask first 5 (in SQL or here); sep page by div according to flow chart
components.name: JS_Functions
components.value:
<script>
function scaleTextboxWidth(elementId) {
  const textbox = document.getElementById(elementId);
  textbox.style.width = (textbox.scrollWidth + 50) + "px";
}
// Example usage
//scaleTextboxWidth("pbid-I_Roles");
//scaleTextboxWidth("pbid-P_Roles");
//scaleTextboxWidth("pbid-Campus_Staff-0");
//scaleTextboxWidth("pbid-Campus_Staff-0");



    $('#pbid-DIRXMIL').click(function(){
         DIR_Event();
      });
function DIR_Event(){

      var Univ_ID_Value = $('#pbid-University_ID').val();
      var User_PIDM_Value = $('#pbid-User_PIDM').val();
      var ID_PARAM_VALUE = $('#pbid-ID_Text_Field').val();
      var PARM_USER_PIDM_Value = $('#pbid-Visitor_PIDM').val();
      var data = {ID_PARAM: ID_PARAM_VALUE,  
                          PIDM: User_PIDM_Value,
                          UNIV_ID: Univ_ID_Value,
                          PARM_USER_PIDM: PARM_USER_PIDM_Value
};

       console.log('values'+ User_PIDM_Value + ' ' + Univ_ID_Value);
       console.log(JSON.stringify(data));

          $.ajax({
        url: 'https://clnt-bansvc.indstate.edu/BannerExtensibility/internalPb/virtualDomains.ISU_Help_Desk_Manager',
        type: 'POST',
        contentType: 'application/json', // Set the Content-Type header to JSON
        data: JSON.stringify(data), // Convert data to JSON string
        success: function(result) {
             alert('Record added');        
//displayMessage('Record successfully updated!', 3000);  
             },
        error: function(request, status, error) {
           alert(request.responseText);
        }
    });
};
</script>


<script>
$(document).ready(function() {
  $("#pbid-ID_Text_Field").keypress(function(event) {
    if (event.which === 13) { // Check if the Enter key is pressed (keyCode 13)
      $("#pbid-Submit").click(); // Trigger a click event on the search button
    }
  });

  $("#searchButton").click(function() {
    // Your search button click event code here
    alert("Search button clicked!");
  });
});
</script>
